name: LetterCounter
0:
”Alexa, open Letter Counter”
”count the letters in triskaidekaphobia”
”count hyperventilate”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter counter
des: Need to check quickly the number of letters in a word? Or working on a puzzle that involves word length? This app is a simple tool to quickly get the letter count of any word.
